## Welcome

This site hosts the teaching materials for **FB2NEP: Nutritional Epidemiology & Public Health**.  
Data are **synthetic and reproducible** — see the [provenance](metadata/provenance.md).  
If you prefer to run notebooks interactively, use the **Colab launchers** below.

---

## Launch in Google Colab

> Tip: the notebooks will auto-generate the dataset if it’s missing, or fall back to a manual upload in Colab.  
> (We recommend keeping the committed CSV for speed.)

### Open a notebook

- 01 · Introduction to Nutritional Epidemiology
